venue.name: Comcast Center for the Performing Arts

item.description:
I am trying to put together a group to hang out with before the show. You must provide your own tickets to get in.

The goal would be to get some people together to listen to music, bbq, play games and hopefully drink with.

Email me directly if you are attending and would like to meet. If the group gets larger, we can designate things for people to bring so there arent duplicates and wasted food and money.

Thanks
Joe
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot to be determined SUNDAY AM. We can meet at a location TBD and follow each other into the parking lot.
item.name: Tailgating at Toby Keith
